con:testCase.name: BadCase-DEV-AES
con:testCase.con:description:
Based on US: https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-3173
As QA I want to implement bad-case tests based on new specification for ATM with AES encryption in SVN: http://mucsgsvn03.sg.de.pri.o2.com/svn/drcrepo/trunk/SRs/Interfaces/ISO-GW-Server/AES/POA%20Fachkonzept%20AES-Migration%20OPAL%20ve1.1%20oAE.pdf
Followed tests must be implemented either with readyApi + ProxyClient on modul level or on Unit test level.
It must be reviewed and make sure, that one test on one of the level [Unit tests or modul test with readyApi] is exist.
Authorisation / Cancel request with TripleDES and BMP.3 (Abwicklungskennzeichen ) contains wrong value (<>280110, 280120) --> Expected response with error BMP.39=2A? Authorisation / Cancel request with AES and BMP.3 (Abwicklungskennzeichen ) contains wrong value (<>280110, 280120) --> BMP.39=2A? Authorisation / Cancel request with TripleDES and BMP.3 (Abwicklungskennzeichen ) contains value =280120 --> BMP.39=2A? Authorisation / Cancel request with AES and BMP.3 (Abwicklungskennzeichen ) contains value =280110 --> BMP.39=2A? For one Authorisation and one Cancel request with TripleDES and BMP.3 =280110 with one of the followed parameter:
BMP110 fields are exist and fullfilled BMP128 fields are exist and fullfilled For one Authorisation and one Cancel request with AES and BMP.3 =280120 with one of the followed parameter:
BMP53 fields are exist and fullfilled BMP57 fields are exist and fullfilled BMP64 fields are exist and fullfilled Expected for tests in both points above either no answer or response with error bmp.39=2A?
Source is: Start of Site 5 in http://mucsgsvn03.sg.de.pri.o2.com/svn/drcrepo/trunk/SRs/Interfaces/ISO-GW-Server/AES/POA%20Fachkonzept%20AES-Migration%20OPAL%20ve1.1%20oAE.pdf

con:restRequest.name: 800N_AES_Diagnose-bmp.3=tripleDes
con:restRequest.con:request:
<ns2:opalMessage xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/iso8583/">
<!-- Enum: 0200, 0400, (0800) --> <mti>${#TestSuite#ReqTyp-Diagnose}</mti> <abwicklungskennzeichen>${#TestSuite#abwZeichenTripleDES}</abwicklungskennzeichen>
<!-- randomly generated, 6 digits --> <tracenummer>1${#Project#Random5}</tracenummer> <lokalzeit>${#TestSuite#LocalTime}</lokalzeit> <lokaldatum>${#TestSuite#LocalDate}</lokaldatum> <tid>
<!-- numeric, 3 digits --> <netzbetreiberId>${#TestSuite#NetzbetreiberID}</netzbetreiberId> <!-- numeric, 5 digits --> <terminalId>${#TestSuite#TerminalID}</terminalId> </tid>
${#TestSuite#encriptionAES} ${#TestSuite#macAES} </ns2:opalMessage>

con:restRequest.name: 810N_Autorisation-AES-BMP.3-Missed
con:restRequest.con:request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <ns2:opalMessage xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/iso8583/"> <!-- Enum: 0200, 0400, (0800) --> <mti>${#TestSuite#ReqTyp-Autorisierung}</mti>
<!-- Topup amount --> <transaktionsbetrag>${#TestSuite#Amount-10}</transaktionsbetrag> <!-- randomly generated, 6 digits --> <tracenummer>${#TestCase#1-TraceNr}</tracenummer> <lokalzeit>${#TestCase#LocalTime}</lokalzeit> <lokaldatum>${#TestSuite#LocalDate}</lokaldatum> <tid> <!-- numeric, 3 digits --> <netzbetreiberId>${#TestSuite#NetzbetreiberID}</netzbetreiberId> <!-- numeric, 5 digits --> <terminalId>${#TestSuite#TerminalID}</terminalId> </tid> <voBlz> <voNummer>${#TestSuite#Partner-1-Code}</voNummer> <blz>${#TestSuite#BLZ}</blz> </voBlz>
<spezielleDialogdaten> <!-- first part (45503A00132016F0F6) probably static, followed by full msisdn, if msisdn 11 disigts long followed by 'F'. Ex.: 45503A00132016F0F6017863xxxxxF--> <kennung>45503A</kennung> <bedienernummer>00</bedienernummer> <zahlart>01</zahlart> <!--Will be overwritten by proxy--> <jahr>${#TestSuite#JahrCurrent}</jahr> <mobilfunknummer>${#TestCase#1-MSISDN}</mobilfunknummer> </spezielleDialogdaten>
${#TestSuite#encriptionAES} ${#TestSuite#macAES} </ns2:opalMessage>

con:restRequest.name: 820N_Autorisation-AES-BMP.110-Missed
con:restRequest.con:request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <ns2:opalMessage xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/iso8583/"> <!-- Enum: 0200, 0400, (0800) --> <mti>${#TestSuite#ReqTyp-Autorisierung}</mti> <abwicklungskennzeichen>${#TestSuite#abwZeichenAES}</abwicklungskennzeichen> <!-- Topup amount --> <transaktionsbetrag>${#TestSuite#Amount-10}</transaktionsbetrag> <!-- randomly generated, 6 digits --> <tracenummer>${#TestCase#1-TraceNr}</tracenummer> <lokalzeit>${#TestCase#LocalTime}</lokalzeit> <lokaldatum>${#TestSuite#LocalDate}</lokaldatum> <tid> <!-- numeric, 3 digits --> <netzbetreiberId>${#TestSuite#NetzbetreiberID}</netzbetreiberId> <!-- numeric, 5 digits --> <terminalId>${#TestSuite#TerminalID}</terminalId> </tid> <voBlz> <voNummer>${#TestSuite#Partner-1-Code}</voNummer> <blz>${#TestSuite#BLZ}</blz> </voBlz>
<spezielleDialogdaten> <!-- first part (45503A00132016F0F6) probably static, followed by full msisdn, if msisdn 11 disigts long followed by 'F'. Ex.: 45503A00132016F0F6017863xxxxxF--> <kennung>45503A</kennung> <bedienernummer>00</bedienernummer> <zahlart>01</zahlart> <!--Will be overwritten by proxy--> <jahr>${#TestSuite#JahrCurrent}</jahr> <mobilfunknummer>${#TestCase#1-MSISDN}</mobilfunknummer> </spezielleDialogdaten>
${#TestSuite#macAES} </ns2:opalMessage>
